page.title: 09Simon's School Day
page.content: I get up at{6:45am}have{cereal and {toast}for breakfast.I set off for school at{8am}from my home near the castle as I like to be early so I can {play football}on the school field. School at Heulfre starts with{Assembly after which we have{Welsh}followed by {Maths and Language work.}As ours is an {open plan school}we work an integrated day and I am responsible for carrying out my assignments. During break I often practise{recorders}or{singing for a{Service,}or{recitation}or dancing for{Urdd}competitions. After a {cafeteria style lunch}I have{football, {rounders or athletics practices. After lunch I work on our current topic of{'Colour'.}All our{science, {creative-writing, art, R.E., music, {drama etc.}are included in this work. I am trying hard to win a prize for the best{'Colour'}Topic book.
